original_text: And the famine was over all the face of the earth: and Joseph opened all the storehouses, and sold unto the Egyptians; and the famine waxed sore in the land of Egypt.
korean_text: 온 지면에 기근이 있으매 요셉이 모든 창고를 열고 애굽 백성에게 팔새 애굽 땅에 기근이 심하며

sentences.original_text: And the famine was over all the face of the earth
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 기근이 온 땅에 퍼져 있었고

sentences.original_text: and Joseph opened all the storehouses
and the famine waxed sore in the land of Egypt
